description: Start with n and reach 2 by repeatedly either dividing by d where d <= the square root or by adding or subtracting 1. The division steps are free, but adding or subtracting 1 costs 1 point. a(n) is the smallest cost to reach 2.
references: Thomas Kantke, Mathematische Unterhaltungen, Spectrum der Wissenschaft, No. 4, 1993, pp. 11-13.
author: Thomas Kantke (bytes.more(AT)ibm.net)
